derivation: feminine passive participle of an unused root (meaning to bind);
outline:
1. band, binding
    1. cords, bands, thongs (metaphorical of slavery)
    2. bunch of hyssop
    3. band of men, troops
    4. vault (of the heavens), firmament (binding earth to the heavens)
strongs_def: a band, bundle, knot, or arch
